Class Button

    • Sprite

    ArrowButton, BackToMainMenuButton, HighscoreButton, InfoButton, LanguageSwapButton, PauseButton, PlayButton, QuitButton, QuitToMainMenuButton, ResumeButton, RetryButton, TutorialButton, UpdateNameButton, VolumeSwapButton

    public class Button
extends GraphicObject
    Button superclass for many buttons in Eat n Yeet procect. Button also extends graphicBbject.

      • Button

        public Button(Texture texture,
              float width,
              float height,
              MainGame mainGame)
        Constuctor that passes information to its supeclass graphicObject. Also sets values to x and y starting and ending positions for program to be able to determine if buttons are clicked.
        Parameters:
        texture -
        width -
        height -

      • update

        public void update()
        Default update for button, methods that all buttons need to call will be added here. Calling superclass update is a must.
        Overrides:
